mapper.select: select t01.comm_postid as postid, t01.comm_title as title, t01.comm_memo as memo, (SELECT tun.user_nm FROM pubmed.tb_user_nt_01 tun where tun.user_email = t01.comm_writer )as user_nm, regdate from pubmed.tb_board_nt01 t01 where deleteflag = 'N' order by postid desc limit 10 offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pubmed.tb_board_nt01 (comm_title, comm_memo, comm_writer, regdate, deleteflag) VALUES (#{title}, #{CommunityContent}, #{user_email}, now(), 'N')
mapper.update: UPDATE pubmed.tb_board_nt01 SET comm_title = #{title}, comm_memo = #{updateContent}, lastwriter = #{user_nm}, -- 글 작성 날짜 유지 lastdate = now() -- 글 수정 날짜를 현재 시간으로 업데이트 WHERE comm_postid = CAST(#{postid} AS INTEGER)
mapper.select: SELECT comm_postid AS postid, comm_title AS title, comm_memo AS memo, (SELECT tun.user_nm FROM pubmed.tb_user_nt_01 tun where tun.user_email = comm_writer) AS user_nm, regdate AS regdate, -- 날짜 형식 지정 lastdate AS lastdate -- 수정일 표시 FROM pubmed.tb_board_nt01 WHERE comm_postid = CAST(#{postid}AS INTEGER)

select tbn.comm_postid as comm_postid, tbn.comm_reno as comm_reno, tbn.comm_writernm as comm_writernm, tbn.comm_rememo as comm_rememo, tbn.comm_reparent as comm_reparent, tbn.comm_redepth as comm_redepth, tbn.comm_reorder as comm_reorder, tbn.redate as redate from pubmed.tb_board_nt02 tbn where tbn.comm_postid = CAST(#{comm_postid} AS INTEGER) and tbn.DELETEFLAG = 'N' order by COALESCE(comm_reparent, comm_reno) DESC, comm_redepth ASC, comm_reorder ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pubmed.tb_board_nt02 (comm_postid,comm_writernm, comm_rememo, comm_reparent, comm_redepth, comm_reorder, redate,deleteflag,lastwriternm) select CAST(#{comm_postid} AS INTEGER) as comm_postid, (select user_nm as user_nm from pubmed.tb_user_nt_01 where user_email = #{user_email}) as comm_writernm, #{replyContent} as comm_rememo, null as reparent, CAST(1 AS INTEGER) as redepth, CAST(COALESCE((SELECT MAX(comm_reorder) FROM pubmed.tb_board_nt02 WHERE comm_postid = #{comm_postid}), 0) + 1 AS INTEGER) as comm_reorder, now() as redate, 'N' as DELETEFLAG, (select user_nm as user_nm from pubmed.tb_user_nt_01 where user_email = #{user_email}) as lastwriternm
mapper.update: update pubmed.tb_board_nt02 set deleteflag = 'Y', lastwriternm = #{lastwriternm}, lastdate = now() where comm_reno = #{comm_reno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pubmed.tb_board_nt02 ( comm_postid, comm_writernm, comm_rememo, comm_reparent, comm_redepth, comm_reorder, redate, deleteflag, lastwriternm) SELECT #{comm_postid}, #{lastwriternm}, #{subreplyContent} as rememo, #{reno} as reparent, -- 부모 댓글 ID (SELECT comm_redepth FROM pubmed.tb_board_nt02 WHERE comm_reno = #{reno}) + 1 as redepth, -- 부모 댓글의 REDEPTH + 1 COALESCE((SELECT MAX(comm_reorder) FROM pubmed.tb_board_nt02 WHERE comm_reparent = #{reno}), 0) + 1 as reorder, NOW() as redate, 'N' as REDELETEFLAG, #{lastwriternm}
mapper.delete: UPDATE pubmed.tb_board_nt01 t01 SET deleteflag = 'Y', lastdate = now() WHERE t01.comm_postid = CAST(#{postid} AS INTEGER)
